page.title: 06ATTITUDES IN LLANBISTER
page.content: Attitudes among the residents of LLanbister are as many and varied as the people themselves. Broadly speaking agriculture and education are the two local issues most often discussed. Because of concern over education cuts the positive attitude towards the local shool was obvious. Agriculture, from E.E.C. and government policy through to local farming practices, brings comments about the lack of understanding of those not involved together with a resigned acceptance of the "farmers lot". Issues of an international or national bias seem to be of less interest. Traditional and tolerant would best sum up the general attitudes. One topic which tops all others in conversation is the weather.
